function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exposure to health hazards in the built environment during covid-19 lockdowns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of safety hazards in dwellings causing anxiety and injury","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of social gradient in harm within different welfare regimes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impacts of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed academic publishing and research output","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deleterious consequences of lockdown measures for health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate review of covid-19 impacts leading to misinformation and ineffective policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift from traditional intellectual engagement to quick, ’what works’ strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid reporting on a wide range of research papers with limited rigor and depth","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental distress and harm from home-based impacts","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited capacity for systematic review due to time constraints","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid completion of a single reviewer study of 200+ papers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of author’s affect, emotion, and biography on the review process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited space to provide systematic coverage of all themes for each type of harm identified","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of physical, sexual, emotional, and verbal violence due to confinement within the home during lockdowns.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public health emergency due to withdrawal or inability to access support services for victims of dv and ipv during lockdowns.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased incidence of ipv during lockdowns, with economic stress and confinement at home being correlated with different types of violence.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in spousal violence during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in ipv during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"180% increase in ipv at a radiology clinic during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of data on ipv and dv rates leading to inaccurate conclusions and decision-making.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public dissemination of uncritically reported news stories and data on ipv and dv rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure of preliminary research results on ipv and dv to the media prior to peer review.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Systemic gender-based violence and femicide","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of criminalization of ipv in some countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of qualitative data and victim voices in accounts of violence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increases in rates of domestic violence and intimate partner violence dv and ipv during stay-at-home lockdowns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide variations in the status of psychological violence and coercive control in countries where domestic violence is criminalized.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial mental health harms attributable to covid-19 lockdowns, including years of life lost yll due to psychosocial consequences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased rates of common mental disorders cmd and psychological distress during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pronounced social gradient in the mental health consequences of lockdowns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in generalised anxiety disorders and depressive symptoms during lockdowns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in suicidal thoughts during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Housing precarity and poor neighborhood quality amplifying health risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of eviction threat with increased stress and weakened immune system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative mental health effects of lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social inequality, housing inequalities, and health inequalities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged exposure to harmful homes as a mechanism for health inequalities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased health harming behaviors during lockdown, including smoking, alcohol consumption, and poor diet.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining levels of physical activity and reductions in fruit and vegetable intake during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased binge drinking during lockdown.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased alcohol consumption during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of displacement pressure on health-harming behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards home-based health-harming behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narratives of freedom from interference may lead to refusal of public health policies, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pooling of social harms within homes may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases and prolonged intensity of harm.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged exposure to social harms in housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluid and conflated spaces due to covid-19 lockdowns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in housing and health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
